name: Fragile - La storia di Nicolò Fagioli

Also known as: Fragile: The Story of Nicolò Fagioli
Official site: A new documentary from Juventus Creator Lab about Nicolò Fagioli and his struggles with ludopathy - https://www.juventus.com/it/news/articoli/fragile-la-storia-di-nicolo-fagioli-e-ora-disponibile

description: Nicolò Fagioli's story is a relatable one, the tale of a boy who realises his dream and then suffers setbacks before setting out on a path to get back on his feet. The betting, the ban and the media pillory he suffered are the bes...
